title.rendered: Kitchen & Bath Design News (KBDN) Features Eldorado not Once, but Twice

content.rendered: The KBDN “Outdoor Kitchens” article highlights how the Eldorado Metropolitan Signature Kitchen is designed to save space outdoors, compared to traditional L-shaped outdoor kitchens. The issue also showcases the new Eldorado Stone showroom at its San Diego headquarters, detailing how the new showroom combines the essence of a retreat, country club, and restaurant.
